def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import ListItem
mestre = widget.ProviderWidget if mestre == None: return
remessa = mestre.Entity if remessa == None: return
status = remessa.Fields["STATUS"]
comandoAjustarNatureza = widget.View.Commands["AjustarNatureza"] if comandoAjustarNatureza != None: comandoAjustarNatureza.Visible = status.Value in(1,5)
comandoExcluirParcelas = widget.View.Commands["ExcluirParcelas"] if comandoExcluirParcelas != None: comandoExcluirParcelas.Visible = status.Value in(1,5)
